de.cect.blockid.identitystorage.identitystorage.blockchainadapter.logic.api

Interface ITransactionSender

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransactionSender

    public interface ITransactionSender
    A transaction sender is used to transmit transactions to tendermint node. This is done by sending a rest request to the node.
    Author:
    ctinnes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String sendTransaction(java.lang.String asciiRepresentation)
      Requests a transaction with the given content from the tendermint node.
      java.lang.String sendTransactionHex(java.lang.String hexRepresentation)
      Requests a transaction with the given content from the tendermint node.
